long_description: The virtually indestructible Prism Designs Stowaway Parafoil kite puts on a spectacular show with its dramatic tail and all-cloth design, yet packs down into a small pouch for easy travel. Single-line kite is easy to fly, requires no assembly and has no frame to break. Ripstop nylon parafoil, 20 ft. tail and 200 ft. of polyester kite string pack into a 6 in. pouch. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The virtually indestructible Prism Designs Stowaway Parafoil kite puts on a spectacular show with its dramatic tail and all-cloth design, yet packs down into a small pouch for easy travel.
